title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Virtual Reality-Based Machine Tool Process Simulation Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain step-by-step procedures of machining processes using virtual reality simulation.
Learners can perform tool setup, machining, and quality inspection processes without errors in a simulated environment.
Learners can analyze simulation results and suggest at least three process improvement measures.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
